Name: Camden Public Library, Local Studies Section

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Wed and Fri 9:30am-5pm; Tues and Thurs 9:30am-8pm; Sat 9am-12pm; closed public holidays and Sundays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books and journals. Introductory brochure available.

About.Acquisition focus: The collection covers all aspects of Camden local area interest and significance, including current and historical materials on people, places, events, social issues, environmental and conservation issues, built and natural environments, local buildings, businesses and organizations, churches, schools.
